about_the_game: Experience the wonderful original soundtrack for Dice Legacy composed by Michael Gordon Shapiro. Featuring 23 original compositions, including two bonus tracks from the Dice Legacy trailers.  Explore a mysterious continent through an evocative soundtrack featuring Simone Vitucci (Cello), Mats Wester (Nyckelharpa) and the etheral vocals of Eurielle. Feel the passing of the seasons, the excitement of discovery, and the call of the unknown — while on a musical journey to discover the truth of the ringworld.
